headline.main: FIRM DAKAR DEFENSE PLEDGED BY BOISSON; Governor Declares West Africa Is 'Prepared for Anything'

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Sept. 22 -- On the eve of the anniversary of the defense of Dakar on Sept. 23 to 25 a year ago Governor General Pierre Boisson of that West African colony received the French, German and other foreign press in Vichy to declare that all West Africa was solidly behind Marshal Henri Philippe Petain and in a better position for defense than ever.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
